description_short: Versatile caravan park offering cabins, as well as powered and unpowered sites.
description_long: A'Wangralea Caravan Park offers a quiet, pet-friendly retreat close to the beautiful Betka Beach. Choose from self-contained cottages, cabins, or spacious powered and unpowered sites set amongst native trees. (Add more details here).

description_short: Unique and rustic mudbrick holiday flats providing a memorable stay in Mallacoota.
description_long: Experience unique, self-contained mudbrick flats nestled in a quiet garden setting, close to Karbeethong Jetty. (Add more details here).

description_short: Comfortable, architecturally designed holiday flats near the lake.
description_long: Modern, comfortable holiday flats with architectural design elements, situated conveniently near the lake in Mallacoota. (Add more details here).

description_short: Seasonal brick oven pizzas.
description_long: Delicious brick oven pizzas available seasonally. Check their Instagram for current operating times and menu. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Seasonal operation. Check Instagram for hours.

description_short: Family-friendly caravan park offering cabins, powered sites, and unpowered sites close to the inlet.
description_long: Offers a range of accommodation options including self-contained cabins and sites for caravans and tents. Close to Karbeethong Jetty and the inlet. (Add more details here).

description_short: A meeting place at St Peter’s Church, often with live music.
description_long: Mobile coffee van located near St Peter's Church, serving great coffee and providing a community gathering spot, sometimes featuring live music. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check Instagram for current hours and days of operation.

business_name: Bribes Gift Shop and Fresh Flowers
description_short: A charming local gift shop with a beautiful selection of items and fresh flowers.
description_long: Find unique gifts, homewares, cards, and beautiful fresh flower arrangements at this lovely local shop. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check locally for current hours.

description_short: Conveniently located waterside units offering easy access to the lake and town.
description_long: Self-contained holiday units situated right near Buckland's Jetty, offering easy access to the water and town amenities. (Add more details here).

description_short: Hire a boat from Buckland Jetty to explore the beautiful Mallacoota Inlet at your own pace.
description_long: Located at Buckland's Jetty, offering a range of hire boats suitable for fishing, cruising, and enjoying the beautiful Mallacoota Lakes system. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Boats for hire at Buckland Jetty.

notes_seasonal: Hours may vary seasonally.

description_short: A well-loved local café with delicious, lovingly crafted food.
description_long: Popular local cafe known for its welcoming atmosphere and delicious menu featuring breakfast, lunch, coffee, and homemade treats. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check locally for current hours.

description_short: Holiday accommodation offering views and comfort in Mallacoota.
description_long: Self-contained holiday accommodation providing comfortable stays with potential views over Mallacoota. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Exterior of Eagle View Stay accommodation.

notes_seasonal: Bookings required.

description_short: Lodge accommodation at Gipsy Point with lake views. Also features a cafe/restaurant.
description_long: Tranquil lodge accommodation with restaurant and boat hire on the Genoa River. Located just outside Mallacoota at Gipsy Point, offering comfortable lodge rooms, self-contained cottages, an on-site restaurant, and boat hire for exploring the river and inlet system. A haven for birdwatchers and nature lovers. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Restaurant hours vary, booking recommended.

description_short: Regional food and lake views at Gipsy Point. Also offers accommodation.
description_long: Enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner featuring regional produce with stunning views over the Genoa River. Located within Gipsy Point Lodge. Accommodation also available. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Dining area at Gipsy Point Lodge Cafe-Restaurant.

notes_seasonal: Restaurant hours vary seasonally. Booking essential, especially for dinner.

description_short: A local favourite, providing clean and comfortable holiday units for visitors.
description_long: Well-established holiday units offering clean, comfortable, and self-contained accommodation in a convenient Mallacoota location. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Gowings of Mallacoota Holiday Units exterior.

description_short: Well-maintained holiday flats offering a peaceful base for your Mallacoota adventures.
description_long: Comfortable self-contained holiday flats located slightly out of the main town centre, offering a quiet base to relax after exploring Mallacoota. (Add more details here).

description_short: Supermarket with a deli, liquor section, and a good selection of groceries. Often stocks fresh local fish.
description_long: Your local IGA supermarket offering a comprehensive range of groceries, fresh produce, meat, dairy, frozen foods, deli items, household goods, and a liquor section. Known for sometimes stocking fresh local fish catches. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Hours may vary on public holidays.

description_short: Enjoy spectacular waterfront views at this historic lodge offering cosy, country-style ensuite rooms. Some rooms open onto the verandah overlooking the water, others to gardens. Ideal for couples, families (sleeps 24 total), celebrations, or small weddings.
description_long: Step back in time at the beautifully preserved Karbeethong Lodge. Enjoy unique guest rooms with ensuite bathrooms, shared lounge areas, expansive verandahs, and breathtaking views across the Mallacoota Inlet. Ideal for romantic getaways, family gatherings, small weddings, or special celebrations. Sleeps up to 24 guests total. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Historic Karbeethong Lodge building exterior with lake view.

notes_seasonal: Bookings essential.

description_short: Seasonal seafood vendor on the wharf, offering fresh local fish and oysters.
description_long: Located right on the main wharf, Kelpy's offers fresh, locally caught seafood, including fish, oysters, and sometimes prawns or crayfish, depending on the season and catch. Primarily takeaway. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Kelpy's Seafood stall on the Mallacoota wharf.

notes_seasonal: Highly seasonal operation, typically open during peak holiday periods and good weather. Check locally.

description_short: Modern accommodation with beautiful lakeside views and easy access to town facilities.
description_long: Offers contemporary self-contained accommodation units enjoying views across the lake. Conveniently located for accessing town shops and waterfront walks. (Add more details here).

description_short: Mobile coffee van serving the Mallacoota area. Look for the van!
description_long: Keep an eye out for Larry's Coffee Van around Mallacoota for your caffeine fix. Serving barista-made coffee and potentially other drinks or snacks. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Mobile vendor. Hours and location vary, check locally.

description_short: Pizza, Fish & Chips, and tasty takeaways.
description_long: Popular takeaway spot offering a range of pizzas with various toppings, classic fish and chips, burgers, and other fast food options. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Lee's Pizza & Take Away shop front.

notes_seasonal: Typically open evenings, hours vary seasonally. Check locally.

description_short: Self-contained holiday cottage accommodation in Mallacoota.
description_long: Charming and comfortable self-contained holiday cottage available for rent, providing a home-like base for exploring Mallacoota. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Bookings required.

description_short: Vibrant Chinese fare, homemade noodles, and house specials.
description_long: Authentic Chinese restaurant serving a wide variety of popular dishes, including homemade noodles, regional specialties, and banquet options. Dine-in and takeaway available. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Typically open for dinner, closed Mondays. Hours may vary seasonally.

description_short: Centrally located holiday units, perfect for exploring Mallacoota on foot.
description_long: Self-contained holiday units situated right in the heart of Mallacoota on the main street, offering easy walking access to shops, cafes, and the waterfront. (Add more details here).

description_short: Iconic sausage rolls, breads, and fresh pastries.
description_long: A traditional Australian bakery serving up a wide range of pies, sausage rolls, pasties, fresh bread, sandwiches, cakes, slices, and barista coffee. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: May close earlier on weekends.

description_short: Large waterfront holiday park offering a wide range of powered/unpowered sites for camping and caravans, plus self-contained cabins.
description_long: Expansive holiday park located right on the Mallacoota Inlet foreshore. Offers numerous powered and unpowered sites for tents, caravans, and campervans, plus various styles of self-contained cabins. Features amenities blocks, playgrounds, boat ramps, and stunning water views. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: View of sites at Mallacoota Foreshore Holiday Park.

description_short: Full-service supermarket with a great deli offering sliced meats, cheeses, smoked fish, roasted chickens, and warm pies.
description_long: Mallacoota's main Foodworks supermarket providing a wide range of groceries, fresh fruit and vegetables, deli items (including sliced meats, cheeses, olives, smoked fish), hot roast chickens, warm pies, frozen foods, and general merchandise. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Hours may vary on public holidays.

description_short: Classic pub-style meals and drinks at the golf club.
description_long: Located within the Mallacoota Golf & Country Club, the bistro offers hearty pub-style meals, snacks, and drinks with views over the golf course. A relaxed dining option after a game or for a casual night out. Golf also available. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Bistro hours vary seasonally and depend on club events. Check website or call for current times and bookings.

description_short: A wide range of hire boats and kayaks available for your fishing or exploring needs.
description_long: Hire various types of boats (tinnies, cruisers) and kayaks to explore the extensive Mallacoota Inlet system independently. Perfect for fishing, sightseeing, and reaching secluded spots. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Hours vary seasonally. Bookings recommended.

description_short: Offers motel accommodation alongside classic pub meals, fresh local seafood, daily specials, and a dog-friendly beer garden.
description_long: The iconic Mallacoota Hotel offers classic pub meals in the bistro, a public bar with TAB facilities, bottle shop, and comfortable motel rooms. Enjoy fresh local seafood, daily specials, and relax in the dog-friendly beer garden. A central hub for locals and visitors. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Bistro hours vary, check website or call. Bar open later. Motel reception hours may differ.

description_short: Local butcher providing a great range of fresh meat, poultry, and BBQ supplies.
description_long: Traditional local butcher shop offering quality fresh cuts of beef, lamb, pork, and chicken, as well as sausages, smallgoods, and barbecue essentials. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Closed Sundays. Hours may vary.

description_short: Your one-stop shop for surf gear, apparel, and beach essentials in Mallacoota.
description_long: Stocking a wide range of surfboards, wetsuits, surf hardware, beachwear, clothing, footwear, sunglasses, and local Mallacoota merchandise. Surf hire potentially available. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Hours may vary seasonally.

description_short: Exquisite, locally sourced pearls and fine jewellery from the Wilderness Coast.
description_long: Specialising in unique pearl jewellery featuring pearls sourced locally from the waters around Mallacoota. Offers necklaces, earrings, bracelets, and custom pieces. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check website or contact for viewing/purchase options.

description_short: Enjoy scenic cruises and fishing charters on the historic MV Loch-Ard with a local expert.
description_long: Take a scenic cruise or fishing charter aboard the historic vessel MV Loch-Ard, skippered by local expert Dale Winward. Explore the Mallacoota Inlet, learn about the area's history and wildlife. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Operates seasonally based on demand and weather. Bookings essential.

description_short: Excellent coffee, treats, and lake views.
description_long: Artisan coffee shop located in the MA space complex, offering expertly brewed coffee, specialty drinks, baked goods, and light snacks with views towards the lake. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check Instagram for current hours.

description_short: Seafood, healthy meals, friendly faces, and local wine.
description_long: Focusing on fresh, local seafood dishes alongside other healthy meal options. Features a curated selection of local wines and offers a relaxed dining experience. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Hours vary seasonally. Bookings recommended. Check website for current times.

description_short: Friendly caravan park offering powered and unpowered sites for camping and caravans.
description_long: A well-established caravan park offering spacious powered and unpowered sites set amongst trees, providing a quieter camping experience. Includes amenity blocks. (Add more details here).

images.alt_text: Shady Gully Caravan Park site area.

description_short: Centrally located accommodation offering both motel rooms and self-contained flats.
description_long: Provides a choice of accommodation styles right in the heart of Mallacoota. Choose from standard motel rooms or larger, self-contained flats suitable for longer stays or families. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check-in times may vary.

description_short: Seasonal cafe located next to the bakery, serving coffee, brunch, and smoothies.
description_long: Bright and breezy seasonal cafe offering delicious brunch options, smoothies, juices, and quality coffee. Located conveniently next to the Mallacoota Bakery. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Typically operates during warmer months/peak season. Check Instagram for current opening days and hours.

business_name: The Wave Oasis Self-Contained B and B
description_short: Relaxed self-contained bed and breakfast accommodation, perfect for a quiet getaway.
description_long: Offers private, self-contained B&B style accommodation with breakfast provisions included. Set in a peaceful location, ideal for couples seeking a relaxing retreat. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Bookings essential.

description_short: Locally made, high-quality candles perfect for gifts or a personal treat.
description_long: Handcrafted candles made locally in Mallacoota, often featuring scents inspired by the surrounding natural environment. Available online or potentially through local stockists. (Add more details here).
notes_seasonal: Check website for purchase options and stockists.
